sentences.sContent: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison , water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison , water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.sCn: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.sContent: The shy okapi – which resembles a cross between a zebra and a giraffe –was first discovered in the Democratic Republic of Congo in 1901.
sentences.sContent_eng: The shy okapi – which resembles a cross between a zebra and a giraffe –was first discovered in the Democratic Republic of Congo in 1901.
sentences.sCn: 害羞的欧卡皮鹿是外形界于斑马和长颈鹿之间的一种动物，1901年在刚果民主共和国首次被发现。

sentences.sContent: It may be able to retrieve obscure texts on, say, the classification procedures for African zebra variants, but be incapable of producing anything sensible about animals in general.
sentences.sContent_eng: It may be able to retrieve obscure texts on, say, the classification procedures for African zebra variants, but be incapable of producing anything sensible about animals in general.
sentences.sCn: 它也许能查出为非洲斑马变种进行分类这样晦涩难懂的课本文字，却找不出任何有关一般动物的合乎情理的描述。

phrases.pCn: [鱼]斑马鱼（一种有斑马条纹的胎生观赏鱼）

trans.tranOther: an animal that looks like a horse but has black and white lines all over its body
